Package configurations

Class ServerConfigurations

  • java.lang.Object
    • configurations.ServerConfigurations

  • public class ServerConfigurations
extends java.lang.Object
    Definition of the configurations for the hippodrome regions (also known as server).
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes
